subject: Many Voices,
author: SnowfireL@aol.com

--part1_5ca58.56fbd265.3ac51dec_boundary

To answer your question Bruce, Is there life after so called, death. I felt 
 a bit silly asking them, but many answered, I could not keep up with them. 
  And Frank Sumption, there is something there for you too. sf
 
_http://www.youtube.com/user/Snowfirel?feature=mhum_ 
(http://www.youtube.com/user/Snowfirel?feature=mhum)
